Free-text notes about the asset or detail, such as descriptions, configuration tags, or other remarks.
Detail line identifier or code distinguishing multiple detail entries for the same asset; commonly a small integer.

Flag indicating whether this detail record is inactive or no longer in use.
Effective or transaction date associated with the detail; format unclear and may be blank-padded; confirm with SME.
